comments:
I'm not sure what I was doing when this error occurred, but I found the 
following walkback in my .log file.  Hope it's helpful:

(Running 20011219 build)

The OpenOnConsoleTypeAction did not properly handle stack traces that 
referenced types for which there was no source.  A BadLocationException 
resulted.

Test Case
Set to have no source for the JDK class libs
put the following in the console
  at java.io.PrintStream.checkError(Class1.java:11)
Place the cursor on the text added
Attempt to open on type.

Fixed in OpenOnConsoleTypeAction#openAndPositionEditor.
Fixed the error reporting as well as the BadLocationException message passed to 
the dialog is null.
*** Bug 6814 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
